title: Homepage Visual and Functional Elements
description: Verify the homepage loads correctly with hero section, featured pizzas, company info, and location finder modal accessible and functional.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage (index.html).
Verify the hero section is displayed with correct images and text.
Verify the featured pizzas section is visible with correct items and images.
Verify company info section is present and correctly formatted.
Open the location finder modal.
Verify the location finder modal opens and displays location selection or map.
Close the location finder modal.
Verify the modal closes without errors.

title: Menu Navigation and Filtering
description: Ensure users can navigate to menu, filter by category, and select pizza sizes successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the menu page (menu.html).
Verify all menu categories (Pizzas, Appetizers, Drinks, Desserts) are displayed.
Filter menu items by category 'Pizzas'.
Verify only pizza items are shown after filtering.
Select different pizza size options for an item.
Verify size selection updates price accordingly.

title: Add to Cart Functionality with Size and Quantity
description: Verify items with selected sizes can be added to the cart with accurate quantity and price calculation.

steps.description: On menu page, select a pizza item and choose size 'Medium'.
Add item to cart with quantity 2.
Verify cart counter in navigation updates to reflect added items.
Open the cart page (cart.html).
Verify cart contains the selected pizza with size 'Medium' and quantity 2.
Verify the displayed price matches the calculation based on size and quantity.

title: Shopping Cart Item Modification and Removal
description: Validate modifying quantity updates the price correctly and items can be removed from the cart.

steps.description: On cart page, increase quantity of an existing item.
Verify the price and order summary update to reflect new quantity.
Decrease quantity back to 1.
Verify updated price reflects the reduced quantity.
Remove an item from the cart.
Verify the item is removed and cart summary updates.

title: Promo Code Validation and Discount Application
description: Check promo codes can be input, validated, and discount is correctly applied in cart summary.

steps.description: On cart page, enter valid promo code.
Apply promo code.
Verify promo code is accepted and discount appears in order summary.
Enter invalid promo code.
Attempt to apply invalid promo code.
Verify error message is shown and no discount applied.

title: Checkout Form Validation and Submission
description: Validate customer info, delivery address, and payment details inputs prevent invalid data and allow order submission on valid input.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout modal from cart page.
Submit empty customer info form.
Verify validation errors are shown for required fields.
Input invalid customer phone and payment card numbers.
Attempt form submission.
Verify validation messages prevent submission.
Input valid customer, delivery, and payment details.
Submit the checkout form.
Verify order confirmation modal appears confirming successful order placement.

title: Order Confirmation and Lookup Functionality
description: Verify order confirmation modal shows after checkout and order lookup via number and phone works with validation.

steps.description: Complete a purchase to trigger the order success modal.
Verify order confirmation modal details the order number and next steps.
Navigate to order tracking page (order-tracking.html).
Submit empty order lookup form.
Verify validation errors are displayed.
Enter invalid order number or phone format.
Attempt to lookup order.
Verify validation prevents lookup.
Enter valid order number and associated phone.
Submit order lookup.
Verify order status and delivery info is displayed correctly with progress steps.

title: Real-Time Order Status Progression Display
description: Ensure order tracking shows correct progressive steps from order confirmation to delivery with driver details when available.

steps.description: Using a valid order lookup, view real-time status page.
Verify order progress is displayed as a step-by-step visual with correct current step highlighted.
Verify delivery driver info is shown if order is out for delivery.
Verify status updates dynamically as order moves through stages.

title: Local Storage Cart Persistence Across Sessions
description: Confirm that cart data persists in local storage across page reloads and user sessions and is consistent across pages.

steps.description: Add items to cart with selected sizes and quantities.
Reload the page or navigate away and back to the cart page.
Verify cart contents are restored correctly from local storage.
Navigate between pages (e.g., menu.html to cart.html).
Verify cart status and counter remain correct and up to date.

title: Responsive Navigation Bar Functionality and Styling
description: Verify the navigation bar is responsive, the cart item counter updates, menu collapses on narrow screens, and active page highlighting works.

steps.description: Resize viewport to simulate desktop and mobile screen sizes.
Verify the navigation bar adapts to mobile width with collapsible menu.
Click the menu toggle on mobile view.
Verify menu expands and collapses properly.
Verify the cart icon displays the correct number of items consistently.
Navigate to different pages and observe the active page indicator in the navigation bar.
Verify the correct menu item is highlighted as active for the current page.

title: Modal Components Open and Close Behavior
description: Test that all interactive modals including location finder, checkout, and order success open and close properly and are responsive.

steps.description: Open the location finder modal from homepage.
Verify modal appears and contents are interactive.
Close the location finder modal.
Verify modal closes without errors.
During checkout, open the checkout modal.
Verify checkout modal is interactive and responsive.
Cancel or close the checkout modal.
Verify modal closes and no partial data causes errors.
After order submission, confirm the order success modal appears.
Verify modal contains order details and can be dismissed properly.

title: Form Validation Edge Cases
description: Verify input validation prevents submission of incorrect or malformed input in customer details, payment info, and order tracking forms including boundary and empty inputs.

steps.description: Attempt to submit customer info form with only whitespace.
Verify input is rejected as invalid.
Enter partial credit card number and submit payment form.
Verify invalid payment details cause form rejection.
Enter invalid postal codes or phone numbers in delivery address.
Verify validation captures these errors.
Enter excessively long inputs for text fields and submit.
Verify application either handles gracefully or shows validation errors.

title: Error Handling on Invalid Promo Codes
description: Ensure entering unknown or expired promo codes results in proper user feedback and no system errors.

steps.description: Enter an expired promo code.
Apply promo code.
Verify error message informs user that promo code is expired.
Enter a promo code with invalid characters.
Apply promo code.
Verify error message about invalid promo code format.
